Package player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
player.Sprite
player.Player
public class Player extends Sprite

This class is used to create a Player object that the player of the game can control.

It extends the Sprite class which contains the needed methods for the Player sprite.

Since:
2022-12-01

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(main.Board board, main.KeyHandler keyH, logic.Collision colz)
      This constructor sets the default attributes to be used in other classes
      Parameters:
      board - The board that shall be updated
      keyH - The keyHandler that allows us to use keys for the interactions
      colz - The collision checker which constantly checks for collision

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerSprite

      public void getPlayerSprite()
      This method gets the player sprite images. It uses the try-catch statement because if there is no sprite to be set, it would return an error

    • defaultValues

      public void defaultValues()
      This method sets the default values of the player.

    • update

      public void update()
      This update() method is called every frame, whenever the player moves. If the player presses W, they go up. If the player presses A, they go left. If the player presses D, they go right. If the player presses S, they go down.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      This is the draw() method used in the update() method in Board.java
      Parameters:
      g2 - The 2D graphics to be drawn
